EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Norman, I just opened the file and it looks great  thank you! Can you send me a picture of your US passport? The fax distorted the image. You can take a picture of it with your phone and just email it to me. Thank you!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Norman Fong [mailto:nfong8@gmail.com] Sent: Monday, March 19, 2012 10:46 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Notary Sara, I finally got it notarized and faxed to you. Just making sure you got it. Thanks, Norman ------------ http://www.safegadget.com <http://www.safegadget.com> http://www.foodnut.com From: Sara Conde Sent: Thursday, March 15, 2012 2:33 PMTo: Norman Fong Subject: RE: Notary Hi Norman, Yes, any notary can act as an authorized representative. You are free to try any notary here is what we have on file for CA: · In the San Francisco, San Mateo and Marin counties, you may try John Minjiras at 415-290-7160. · In the San Jose and Santa Clara area, you can contact Stacey E.. · Red Tomatoes is a Certified California Bay Area Notary Public in Oakland, Berkeley, Alameda, S.F. We can refer employees to this company as well. The charge is $10. They may be contacted at http://www.redtomatoes.org. · In Northern CA (Sacramento, Roseville, Woodland, Davis and other surrounding areas within a 25 mile radius of zip 95820), you can contact Cahee Taylor at A. Mobile Notary. The contact information is: a247notary@gmail.com or they can be reached by phone at 916-402-5881. $15 rate if the Associate travels to the contact for the notarization $25 rate if the contact travels to the Associate for the notarization Please be sure to use the I-9 that populates after you fill out your online enrollment. You may expense the cost of the notary fee. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. Can anybody with a notary handle this? http://www.uscis.gov/files/form/i-9.pdf <http://www.uscis.gov/files/form/i-9.pdf>Do I get it notarized and fax it in?
